price: Ahubwo, Allah ni We Mugenga wanyu, kandi ni We Mutabazi uhebuje.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
